alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 4:03AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHWESTERN PASQUOTANK...BERTIE...HERTFORD...GATES AND NORTHWESTERN CHOWAN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM EST... At 403 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Aulander to near Lewiston Woodville to near Tarboro. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ahoskie, Aulander, and Lewiston Woodville around 410 AM EST. Cofield and Powellsville around 415 AM EST. Winton around 420 AM EST. Harrellsville around 425 AM EST. Windsor and Gatesville around 430 AM EST. Colerain around 435 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Gliden, Kelford, Earleys, Newsome Store, Savage, Arrowhead Beach, and Republican. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank
